name: assigned
description: Assignee name, coming from Bugzilla.

name: assigned_to_bot
description: True if the given assignee is identified as a bot.

name: assigned_to_domain
description: Domain associated to the assignee in SortingHat profile.

name: assigned_to_gender
description: Assignee gender, based on their name (disabled by default).

name: assigned_to_gender_acc
description: Assignee gender accuracy (disabled by default).

name: assigned_to_id
description: Assignee Id from SortingHat.

name: assigned_to_multi_org_names
description: List of the assignee organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: assigned_to_name
description: Assignee name.

name: assigned_to_org_name
description: Assignee organization name.

name: assigned_to_user_name
description: Assignee user name from SortingHat.

name: assigned_to_uuid
description: Assignee's UUID from SortingHat profile.

name: assigned_to_detail_bot
description: True if the given assignee is identified as a bot.

name: assigned_to_detail_domain
description: Domain associated to the assignee in SortingHat profile.

description: Assignee gender, based on their name (disabled by default).

description: Assignee Id from SortingHat.

name: author_bot
description: True/False if the author is a bot or not.

name: author_domain
description: Author's domain name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_gender
description: Author gender, based on their name (disabled by default).

name: author_gender_acc
description: Author gender accuracy (disabled by default).

name: author_id
description: Author's ID from SortingHat profile.

name: author_name
description: Author's name.

name: author_org_name
description: Author's organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_multi_org_names
description: List of the author organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: author_user_name
description: Author's username from SortingHat profile.

name: author_uuid
description: Author's UUID from SortingHat profile.

name: bug_id
description: Id of the bug in Bugzilla.

name: changeddate_date
description: Datetime when the bug was last changed.

name: changes
description: Number of changes in the bug.

name: comments
description: Number of comments in the bug.

name: component
description: The component on which the bug was reported.

name: creation_date
description: Datetime when the bug was created.

name: creation_ts
description: Timestamp when the bug was created.

name: creator
description: Creator name, from Bugzilla.

name: creator_detail_bot
description: True if the given Creator is identified as a bot.

name: creator_detail_domain
description: Domain associated to the Creator in SortingHat profile.

name: creator_detail_gender
description: Creator gender, based on their name (disabled by default).

name: creator_detail_gender_acc
description: Creator gender accuracy (disabled by default).

name: creator_detail_id
description: Creator Id from SortingHat.

name: creator_detail_multi_org_names
description: List of the Creator organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: creator_detail_name
description: Creator name.

name: creator_detail_org_name
description: Creator organization name.

name: creator_detail_user_name
description: Creator user name from SortingHat.

name: creator_detail_uuid
description: Creator's UUID from SortingHat profile.

name: delta_ts
description: The timestamp of the last update.

name: description
description: Long description of the bug.

name: description_analyzed
description: Long description of the bug (analyzed).

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: The creation date of the bug.

name: id
description: The bug ID.

name: is_bugzilla_bug
description: 1 if the item type is a bug.

name: is_bugzillarest_bugrest
description: 1 if the bug comes from the Bugzillarest backend.

name: is_open
description: True if the status of the bug is open.

name: keywords
description: Set of keywords added to the bug.

name: labels
description: Custom repository labels defined by the user.

name: last_comment_date
description: Datetime when the last comment was posted to the bug

name: main_description
description: Short description of the bug / title.

name: main_description_analyzed
description: Short description of the bug / title (analyzed).

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: op_sys
description: The operating system on which the bug was observed.

name: origin
description: Original URL of the instance where the bug was retrieved from.

name: painless_last_comment_delay
description: Time in days since the last comment was posted in the bug until the current time.

name: painless_time_to_now
description: Contains the value of `timeopen_days` if the status is different from 'Closed' and the value of `resolution_days` otherwise.

name: platform
description: The platform on which the bug was reported.

name: priority
description: The priority of the bug (P1 = most urgent, P5 = least urgent).

name: product
description: The product on which the bug was reported.

name: project
description: Project (metadata).

name: project_1
description: Project (metadata, if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy).

description: Custom repository labels defined by the user.

name: resolution
description: The bug's resolution.

name: resolution_days
description: Time in days between the bug's creation date and the date of the last change.

name: severity
description: The bug's severity.

name: status
description: The bug's status.

name: tag
description: Original URL of the instance where the bug was retrieved from.

name: timeopen_days
description: Time in days since the creation of the bug until the current date.

name: time_to_first_attention
description: Time in days since the creation of the bug until the date of the first comment made in the bug by any user different from the author.

description: The bug's URL.

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.

name: whiteboard
description: The bug's whiteboard field.
